statements: SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE shares > 100;
SELECT post_id, comments FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE likes < 50 ORDER BY comments DESC;
SELECT username, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 10;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE comments >= 20 AND shares <= 50 ORDER BY likes DESC;
SELECT id, username, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE username = 'john_doe' ORDER BY likes DESC, shares ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE post_id = 123456;
SELECT username, SUM(likes) AS total_likes FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY username HAVING total_likes > 100;
SELECT username, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement_metrics WHERE id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT username, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM social_media_engagement_metrics GROUP BY username ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiment_metrics;
SELECT id, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiment_metrics ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT customer_id, engagement_level FROM customer_sentiment_metrics WHERE engagement_level > 3;
SELECT post_id, platform, likes, shares FROM social_media_engagement WHERE platform = 'Twitter';
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC, likes ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_sentiment_metrics WHERE sentiment_score > 0.7 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC, engagement_level ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiment_metrics GROUP BY customer_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY avg_sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT post_id, platform, likes + shares + comments AS total_engagement FROM social_media_engagement WHERE engagement_rate > 2.5 ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
SELECT customer_id, sentiment_score FROM customer_sentiment_metrics WHERE sentiment_score BETWEEN 0.4 AND 0.6 ORDER BY customer_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM social_media_engagement WHERE platform = 'Twitter' AND (likes > 1000 OR shares > 500) ORDER BY likes DESC, shares DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_id = 1;
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count > 100;
SELECT post_date, likes_count, shares_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE shares_count <= 50 ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date >= '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY shares_count DESC, likes_count ASC;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count > 100 ORDER BY post_date DESC
SELECT post_id, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE shares_count < 50
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY likes_count DESC
SELECT post_id, post_content, post_date FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count > 50 AND shares_count > 20
SELECT post_id, post_content, likes_count, shares_count FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE likes_count < 50 OR shares_count < 10 ORDER BY post_id ASC
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT account_id, account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count FROM posts ORDER BY likes_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM comments WHERE post_id = 1001;
SELECT sentiment_type, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM sentiments GROUP BY sentiment_type;
SELECT * FROM social_media_accounts ORDER BY followers_count DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT account_name, followers_count, engagement_rate FROM social_media_accounts WHERE followers_count > 10000 ORDER BY engagement_rate DESC;
SELECT account_name, followers_count FROM social_media_accounts WHERE engagement_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY followers_count ASC;
SELECT post_content, likes_count, comments_count, shares_count FROM posts WHERE comments_count > 50 ORDER BY likes_count DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT commenter_name, comment, timestamp FROM comments WHERE comment LIKE '%positive%' ORDER BY timestamp ASC LIMIT 20;
SELECT * FROM UserProfiles;
SELECT post_content, author_name FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT username, email FROM UserProfiles WHERE join_date < '2021-06-01';
SELECT post_id, reaction_type, user_id FROM PostReactions ORDER BY reaction_id DESC;
SELECT analysis_date, sentiment_score FROM SentimentAnalysis WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM SocialMediaPosts ORDER BY post_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, post_content FROM SocialMediaPosts WHERE post_date > '2022-01-01' AND post_date < '2022-03-01';

SELECT u.username, p.post_content, s.sentiment_score FROM UserProfiles u JOIN SocialMediaPosts p ON u.user_id = p.post_id JOIN SentimentAnalysis s ON p.post_id = s.post_id WHERE s.sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_posts FROM SocialMediaPosts GROUP BY author_name ORDER BY total_posts DESC;
SELECT u.username AS author, COUNT(e.engagement_id) AS total_engagement FROM UserProfiles u JOIN UserEngagement e ON u.user_id = e.user_id GROUP BY u.username ORDER BY total_engagement DESC;
